title: Flatland: Fallen Angle Free-For-All [MAC]
description:
Inspired by a 19th Century novella, Flatland: Fallen Angle is the noir-esque tale of an isosceles triangle on the run from the law and hungry for revenge! Over ten astonishingly two-dimensional levels, the player must negotiate the various neighbourhoods of Polygonometropolis, and use their angles to slice, splinch and shatter anyone who gets in their way! The gameplay feels a little bit like Pacman, and the narrative approach is reminiscent of BastionÃ¢â‚¬â€but it all adds up to an absolutely unique short-form game experience!

We're giving away this Free-For-All version to support our new game, Particulars, which is currently on Steam Greenlight - http://greenlight.particularsgames.com

The Free-For-All version also includes:

*Bonus soundtrack
*Two video documentaries about creating the game
*The Shaping of a Studio - a 60-page eBook chronicling the development of the game which was originally built in just 96 hours.

To find out more about us, please visit http://particularsgame.com/
